info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Schenectady, southeastern Saratoga, southwestern Washington and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Round Lake, or near Mechanicville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban or poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Clifton Park, Saratoga Springs, Mechanicville, Niskayuna, Round Lake, Country Knolls, Alplaus, East Glenville, Burnt Hills, Halfmoon, Malta, Lee, Easton, Stillwater, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Deans Corners, Schaghticoke Hill, Glenridge and Johnsonville. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 8A and 13N. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
